mainText:
Steve's passion to enrich our world through technology has created jobs, wealth and excitement like no other industry has done since the early 1900s with the invention of the automobile and airplanes.

Hopefully one day soon the energy industry will have a leader of passion for technology and take us to where we have not been before.

Much love, peach and blessings to the Jobs and Apple family.

Press on!
author: Hardia
